author: rjmholt
body:
<!-- Anything that looks like this is a comment and can't be seen after the Pull Request is created. -->

# PR Summary

Fixes https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/11619.

## PR Context

Returns the `PowerShellStreamType` enum to code, since it was public, generically named and removed. Adds an `ObsoleteAttribute` to prevent new usage.

comments.author: rjmholt
comments.body: CodeFactor issues are due to reusing previous documentation comments

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:

title: Restore the PowerShellStreamType enum with an ObsoleteAttribute
